page.title: 06ILKESTON FAIR
page.content: {Ilkeston Fair}has been in existence since 1252. It is held each year on the Market Place, Pimlico Car Park and South Street. At the fair there are{rides and side- {shows.}The two most popular rides are the{Waltzer}and the{Dodgems.}There are also rides for very young children which are called{Roundabouts.}Games and sideshows, like{hook-a-duck, darts and{hoopla,}are also very popular. You can also play on the{rifle range}and {coconut shy.}At the fair children eat food like{candyfloss, toffee apples} and{brandy snaps.} At night the fair is very bright and colourful with the flashing lights and noisy with the music. It can be quite expensive at the fair with most rides and games costing about 30 pence each.
